response.original_title: Beyond Gangster Blackface: A Critical Analysis of Gangster Rap
response.overview: The documentary "Beyond Gangster Blackface: A Critical Analysis of Gangster Rap" takes a critical look at the power of music lyrics and how lyrics can influence the mentality, language, and behavior of young impressionable children.
response.title: Beyond Gangster Blackface: A Critical Analysis of Gangster Rap
